title: Organic Dead Sea Salt Crystal Peel Facial Treatment - Brazilian Waxing Center.Spa Services In Manhattan NY
description: Salt crystallizes and instantly removes all dead skin cells and debris at your fingertips while massaging the peel into the skin.
